entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
I bought this domain a few years ago thinking that I might put it to good use as a blog someday. After several failed ideas on how to get started and accidentally letting this domain expire once, I'm finally writing my first blog post.

I'm a Software Developer inspired by the likes of Ocramius, Anthony Ferrara, DHH, and countless others in the Open Source community to blog about some of the things I'm most passionate about. I plan to use this space to write on Programming, Vim, and Programming related things; especially related to PHP and Object Oriented Programming and Design.
